price: 11. Maka Allah melindungi mereka dari kesusahan hari itu, dan memberikan kepada mereka keceriaan dan kegembiraan.
arabic: فَوَقَىٰهُمُ ٱللَّهُ شَرَّ ذَٰلِكَ ٱلۡيَوۡمِ وَلَقَّىٰهُمۡ نَضۡرَةٗ وَسُرُورٗا

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Sabeq Company
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Sabeq Company, printed in 2016. corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: fawaqāhumu al-lahu sharra dhālika al-yawmi walaqqāhum naḍratan wasurūran
translations: and will cause them to meet
